events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where my vehicle was severely damaged. I want to file a claim immediately.
Your insurance claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as it involves vehicle collision and damage.
An agent has been assigned to your case to help guide you through the claim process for your car accident.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will proceed with investigations promptly.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any medical reports related to the accident.
All requested documents, including police report and vehicle damage photos, have been submitted for your review.
Our insurance team has started the investigation into your vehicle collision claim to assess damages and liability.
Investigation has been completed, confirming the extent of damages and verifying the accident details.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on the damage assessment report and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely updates during the claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and the final settlement amount has been confirmed.
Payment for the approved settlement has been issued and should reflect in your account shortly.
We have closed your claim file post payment issuance. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
Your auto accident claim documentation has been archived securely for future reference if needed.
